USER QUERY: When any patio remote receives a Fast On (DFON) between 18:00 and 23:00 on weekdays, set all remotes backlight to 80%.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekday DFON -> Set remotes backlight to 80%",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When any patio remote is rapidly turned on during weekday evenings, set backlight to 80%.",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
      { "==": { "device": "C 47 16 3", "control": "DFON" } },
      { "or": 1 },
      { "==": { "device": "C 47 16 4", "control": "DFON" } },
      { "or": 1 },
      { "==": { "device": "C 47 16 5", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "18:00", "to": { "time": "23:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "C 47 16 3", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "C 47 16 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "C 47 16 5", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Use DFON (fast on) as a COC trigger; restrict to weekdays 18:00-23:00 to limit activation window; update backlight to 80% on all listed remotes via their BL accept command."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
